description: From the anterior extremity of the nasal bones to the posterior extremity of the occiput.
From the anterior extremity of nasal bones to the suture between the nasal and the frontal bones.
From the anterior extremity of the nasal bones to the anterior extremity of the orbit.
From the suture between nasal and frontal bones to the suture between the frontal and the parietal bones.
From the suture between frontal and parietal bones to the suture between the parietal and the interparietal bones.
Least width on the interorbital region, at the frontal bones.
Width between lateral extremities of the zygomatic arches, at the jugal bones.
From the posterior margins of incisive alveolus to the anterior margin of the foramen magnum.
From the posterior margin of the incisive alveolus to the anterior margin of upper premolar 4 (P4) alveolus.
From to the anterior margin of P4 alveolus to the anterior margin of mesopterygoid fossa.
From the anterior margin of mesopterygoid fossa to the anterior margin of the foramen magnum.
From the stylar process to the posterior extremity of the auditory bulla.
From the suture between basisphenoid and basioccipital to highest point of the braincase.
Major width of maxilla between upper molar 2 and upper molar 3.
Width of rostrum at the suture between premaxilla and maxilla.
Distance between dorsal and ventral surface at the level of premaxilla and nasal bones, respectively.
From the ventral extremity of the inferior zygomatic root to the suture between premaxilla, frontal and nasal bones.
